code: import axios from"axios";axios.interceptors.response.use(null,function(error){var expectedError=error.response&&error.response.status>=400&&error.response.status<500;if(!expectedError){console.log("logging the error",error);alert("An unexpected error occurred");}return Promise.reject(error);});function setJwt(jwt){axios.defaults.headers.common["x-auth-token"]=jwt;}export default{get:axios.get,post:axios.post,put:axios.put,delete:axios.delete,setJwt:setJwt};
